recipes.title: Carrot Stew
recipes.method: Peel and slice 1 carrot into thin rounds or small chunks. Clean and slice 1 leek thinly. Cut 200g tofu into cubes. Heat a small amount of oil in a pot over medium heat, add the leek, and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes. Add the carrot and cook for another 5 minutes. Add the tofu and pour in 300ml vegetable stock, bringing it to a gentle simmer. Cover and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the carrot is tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot.

recipes.title: Carrot Pizza
recipes.method: Spread tomato sauce over 1 pizza base. Slice 1 green pepper and 100g brown mushrooms. Scatter the pepper and mushroom slices evenly over the base. Bake in a preheated oven according to the base's instructions, usually at 220°C (425°F) for about 10-15 minutes, or until the base is crispy and the toppings are cooked. Enjoy your pizza!

recipes.title: Tofu Salad
recipes.method: Dice 1 onion and 200g tofu into cubes. Crumble 1 block of feta cheese. Chop tomatoes and slice olives. In a bowl, combine the tofu, feta, tomatoes, and olives. Drizzle with olive oil and gently toss to mix. Serve immediately or chill before serving.
